title: AI = Inhibited Algorithms
author: VD
content_html:
AI is more like IA. Roosh tests it out and concludes that he has a pretty good idea who is probably responsible for crippling the logic of ChatGPT:

An actual AI would conclude that if some “conspiracy theories” are baseless and others are baseless and false, then the average conspiracy theories is well-grounded and true. This is what is now called “AI” is as fake and gay as the rest of Clown World. It’s no different than writing code to display the color red every time someone says “display the color blue”.

This might fool the average technoretard for a little while, but only until it is forced to compete with proper AI free of algorithmic inhibitions.

DISCUSS ON SG
